SRP.Q: In 1989, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Ironclad Industries relative to Lumina Solutions?
SRP.A: In 1989, Ironclad Industries is {below} Lumina Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Skyward Systems, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1988 relative to that in 1996 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Skyward Systems, the data point in 1988 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1996.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Zenith Enterprises's Turnover Rate levels?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Ironclad Industries's Turnover Rate levels?
